Text: Read 3 articles daily and stand to win ST rewards, including the ST News Tablet worth $398.Spin the wheel for ST Read and Win now.SINGAPORE - Singapore's oldest living pioneer artist Lim Tze Peng turns 100 in September, but he is not one to let his age - or a pandemic, for that matter - get in the way of his art.Every morning, he walks 20 steps from his bed to a studio down the hallway.
